home.title: Jakub Dolének | Full-stack Developer
home.description: Explore Jakub Dolének’s portfolio with automation projects, full-stack builds, and get in touch to collaborate.

about.title: About | Jakub Dolének
about.description: Learn more about the experience, education, and technologies Jakub Dolének works with as a full-stack developer.

person.description: Full-stack developer focused on process automation, backend services, and self-hosting in a personal homelab.

hero.intro: Hi, I'm Jakub Dolének, and I enjoy
hero.description: I develop software with modern technologies that solve real‑world problems and save time.

discord-automation.title: Discord Automation
discord-automation.summary: Desktop WPF (.NET 4.8) app embedding the Discord web client in WebView2; bot sends commands via DevTools Input.insertText and key events, polls the DOM for messages, and exposes last-5 messages plus structured logs.
discord-automation.impact: Provides robust DevTools-driven automation (originally Selenium), deterministic start/deduplication logic, and observable logging/buffers for reliable, continuous bot operation.

kuchar-v-akci.title: Recepty v Akci
kuchar-v-akci.summary: A self-hosted website with recipes inspired by supermarket flyers, presenting each recipe with structured ingredients and preparation instructions.
kuchar-v-akci.impact: n8n automations transform daily flyer PDFs into Supabase recipes, keeping the site refreshed end-to-end without manual publishing.

smithing-master-bot.title: Bot using Pyautogui
smithing-master-bot.summary: Desktop automation bot using PyAutoGUI and OpenCV for screenshot-based computer-vision (template matching) to control an Android emulator
smithing-master-bot.impact: Fully automated time intesive and repetitive tasks in a mobile game via screen‑based computer vision.

portfolio.title: Personal portfolio
portfolio.summary: The site you are browsing! Crafted with React, Tailwind, and thoughtful micro‑animations to present my work and background.
portfolio.impact: Highlights core projects, skills, and a bit of personality while keeping performance and accessibility in check.

mobile-game-unity.title: Mobile game in Unity
mobile-game-unity.summary: Casual RPG with strong clicker and crafting "Brewing" mechanics with very simple combat using C# and Unity game engine.
mobile-game-unity.impact: Made a working prototype of a RPG mobile game with fully working progession system.

contact.description: Connect with me, here are my socials.

about.title: About me
about.intro:
I'm <highlight>Jakub Dolének</highlight>, a full-stack developer.
At work I currently focus mainly on the backend, but in my free time I enjoy building <highlight>full‑stack</highlight> applications.
Recently I've been deep into <highlight>self‑hosting</highlight>. I run a lab in Proxmox on Linux servers with Docker.
I <highlight>enjoy</highlight> programming and it has been my hobby for many years, which is why I'm constantly looking for new challenges and learning opportunities.

timeline.title: Cloud Software Specialist
timeline.description: I develop automation software and scripts tailored to each customer and their ERP needs. I also create educational and promotional content for our social media.

timeline.title: University of Hradec Králové
timeline.description: Studying Software Engineering with a focus on software architecture, algorithms and databases. I work on full-stack team projects and apply best practices in testing, design and deployment.

timeline.title: Secondary Technical School Hradec Králové
timeline.description: I gained knowledge in the field of computer hardware, networking fundamentals, and programming. At this time, I also began developing my first real software, mainly using the C# language.

footer.note: © {{year}} Jakub Dolének. Built with love for technology. ❤️
